metadata.title: CVE-2016-9186 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in the "legacy course files" and"file manager" modules in Moodle 3.1.2 allows remote authenticated users toexecute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension,and then accessing it via unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
